A regular hexagon is inscribed in a circle of radius $ 10$ inches.  Its area is:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 150\sqrt{3} \text{ sq. in.} \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ \text{150 sq. in.} \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 25\sqrt{3} \text{ sq. in.} \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ \text{600 sq. in.} \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\  300\sqrt{3} \text{ sq. in.}$
